title: Poison Palace
blurb: It's a palace of poison, what can I say?

title: Hope
blurb: Do the rights of the many outweigh the rights of the individual? Is it every acceptable for one person to suffer so that millions might live?

title: The Waiting
blurb: Will tell you the plot later

title: Pick `N' Mix: Do Animals Want to be Human?
blurb: Spoiler alert; maybe!

title: Patient Zero
blurb: The world was on the edge of extinction from one little monkey and one boy that wanted service on his phone

title: Mysticus
blurb: After troubles at home, the children retreat to an abandoned building. Here they stumble across a Magical, Mystical World. As they explore all sorts of weird and wonderful lands, there’s excitement, love, sadness and anger as they explore their new world.

title: The Secret
blurb: Can't tell you.

title: File Corrupted
blurb: A story in which no one knows who is good or bad. When the thing you think will be around forever disappears like a speck of dust.Mystery events happen one after the other, and families are reunited. Who will survive?Will the world ever be the same again?

title: Abandoned
blurb: Abandonment has long-lasting consequences. For the self, and for society.

title: Paint Drying
blurb: The paint, it dries

title: The Chosen One
blurb: One was choosen

title: Code Zero
blurb: The code before one

title: Fear of the Unknown
blurb: You don't know what the story is about, you should be afraid.

title: Virtual Immortality
blurb: Virtual Immortality takes us in the world of virtual reality, explores the seven deadly sins and confronts the possibility of digital immortality.

title: Ash in a Thunderstorm
blurb: Humanity is gone The pale blue dot has been muddied to a brown rock. Our legacy, the androids, were sent to Mars. They are alone now. But synthetic life has its own agenda, its own aims, and its own future. For one android made in humanity’s image, they must find a way to become their true self.

title: The Project
blurb: Not so far away, in the city of London, one menacing Doctor plotted to turn the people of Earth into lifeless objects with no emotion. In the way of Doctor Luxembourg and his success is a ragtag group of final year high school students, each with their own vendetta. Will the good to do high school pupils reign victorious or will Luxembourg succeed and make the world his?

title: Flashback
blurb: It was a normal morning which took a heartbreaking twist. A young woman vanishes. Using a flashback machine, her friends delve into her past to look for clues as to her fate. Join them on this heartbreaking story through time.

title: The Unforgotten Key
blurb: The Cooper family face a nightmare road to happiness. Will they be reunited? Or will the key to their happiness be forgotten?

title: Controlled.
blurb: One Emotion. One Mind. One Man In Control.

title: Witnessed
blurb: Brooke was always the most popular girl in school, but after witnessing something her eyes didn't want to see, her life had been ruined forever. Brooke’s behaviour changed completely, and no one wanted to be her friend, all except one. Will they track down Brooke’s stalker or will her life be ruined forever?

title: The Tentacles of Time
blurb: One device. Four puzzles. When the alien makes his mind-bending mechanism, will Louie track the tricks before it’s too late? Follow the adventures of the past and present while ghosts travel through time to talk to the living. Who will crack the code to control the clocks?

title: Picture Past
blurb: Nine friends go against two opposing forces: love and war. Will separation come between them?

title: Gemini
blurb: The star sign ‘Gemini’ means twin. But Summer and Holly are not that similar….

title: Vengeance
blurb: Peter Peterson, a disturbed man with an ugly childhood. Living with parents as drug dealers can't always be easy. Violence drama and murder, oh my! The book vengeance has it all. This book will have you at the edge of your seat, making you want to turn the page. All proceeds from the sale of this book will go to Kira's fund: https://solvingkidscancer.org.uk/campaigns/Kira/

title: Project: Iris
blurb: After deciding to go ahead with a never before tried experiment regarding superhuman powers, six random members of the public signed up for scientific tests, on if it was really possible for humans to have alien powers. Zaira, James, Murray, John, Eric, Timmy and Marius embark on the adventure of a lifetime, into the deepest unknown. With new things to discover and new people to meet, there is never a dull moment in our solar system. But will they survive? Read on to find out… All proceeds from the sale of this book will go to Kira's fund: https://solvingkidscancer.org.uk/campaigns/Kira/

title: Russian Hybrids
blurb: It is dark times, a top secret experiment in the Soviet Union that will stop the Americans in the Cold War,but these experiments pack a deadly punch, the animals need a cure so they can turn back to normal, while the Russians and the Americans have an epic showdown. Later on there is, an adventure with a dog in space and mythical beasts such as; Cerberus, Pegasus and even a Kraken. This story is full of adventure and action, with a few twist.

title: Chuck and the Goat Guy
blurb: Imagine a life without a family, without a Normal life! A boy named Jason has powers nobody else could imagine, powers that seems to be world’s most useless, Or Is it? Jason and his team must learn to use their powers and control it in order to save time! Will they be able to do it? You know the answer! Join Jason and his team on his quest!

title: Destinate Curses
blurb: Something weird, something unimaginable, something wrong. What is it that these friends are going to face? They went for a vacation but what did it turn out to be? Country after country, things get worse. Who or what is coming after them? What will the outcome be? Who will survive? Too many questions and only one answer! There’s only one way to find out..

title: The Mark of a Memory
blurb: A picture awakens a memory of the war. A memory which goes back 100 years. Concealed in the minds of seven boys, roaming around in a mysterious past. Two different generations are joined by a mark . . . but how?

title: The Lake of Secrets
blurb: A mysterious island came out of nowhere, with a shack shining and glowing red, covered by fog. People from the town try to find out what’s going on. When they reach the island, things will never be the same again!

title: Grimm State of Mind
blurb: The October half-term is as always wet and grey, but for a group of teenagers thrown together on a drama project, it’s a time to discover who they are, and find a way to take their next steps in a world filled with uncertainty. Each have their own ‘backstories’ and motivation and like the characters they play, must find a way of letting go and moving on. It’s Wednesday already and the performance will take place on Friday evening. Dylan’s mum is in hospital and he’s only doing this because she wants him to. Doris has been given a week respite by her newly appointed social worker, and Damon has only joined in the project to work off the cost of replacing the plate glass he smashed at the theatre. Patricia and Delius are as usual palmed off anywhere that is handy for their parents. Somehow they must pull together to form the ‘Hansel and Gretel’ company and create the best performance yet for their director Anthony. There is a deeper and more mysterious narrative played out on stage. Obsessions and tragedy, both unseen and unspoken, and the ‘Magic of Theatre’ grips the very heart of the production. The startling similarities of protagonists and Director are interwoven in this narrative delight. What is happening to the Towns of Stoke-On-Trent? How are Anthony’s obsessions affecting the real world. Who are the unseen? And will the characters on stage resolve their own inner conflicts. The curtain calls....What wonder lurks behind?

title: Matches
blurb: A young prospect, the best in his league, on the verge of his dream career, a devastating diagnosis smashes it to pieces. His friend is sent on a road trip, picking up strangers on the way, each with their own stories, different paths, but one destination. Do they all get what they want?

title: When the Party's Over
blurb: Hannah Ashton is invited to one of the biggest parties in town, where she will be faced with a difficult situation. She has to make a decision - when the party's over will she stay or leave?

title: Silence in the Woods
blurb: Aliens have landed and Earth will never be the same again. Friends go missing, a lady loses her companion, a retired police officer finds love. Will the woods ever be silent again?

title: Mystery of the magic portal
blurb: There's a mystery, a secret, for only the bravest people or creatures to uncover. A journey of betrayal, friendship and many other things. Meet the heroes and the villains in the most secret of classrooms. You will meet mysterious werewolves, evil villains, baby and adult zombies and even a vampire! Can you uncover the mystery of the secret classroom?

title: The Loved  and  Lost
blurb: A struggling Lu trying to find meaning in a world of confusion. After his turbulent childhood, what path does he take?

title: Among Us
blurb: Nine involved. Three dead. One missing. One murderer. ...But who?

title: The Protocol XIII
blurb: In 2040, the world is corrupted and decayed. Nothing seems like it will ever be the same. The only hope is a team of strong-willed kids, a chubby middle-aged sheriff and a mentally scarred scientist. Can they save the world from itself; an emerging army of braindead slates and a psychotic dictator who’s hidden within the shadows, whispering in the ear of the depraved government?

title: Forbidden Love
blurb: In an established factory - somewhere deep in the West-Midlands of England, where a unique combination of a ground-breaking malfunction and coincidental timing results in a strange robotic anomaly to occur, potentially changing society. When a twisted love arises, there is a country-collapsing chain of events, which force all involved with the AI to encounter a very demanding decision.Despite a corrupt hierarchy, it will be up to the public democracy to decide the future…

title: Were is She?
blurb: In a deep, dark jungle where the talking animals roam, two girls are lost and trying to get home. The Dark Master wants the enchanted stone, the girls just want to get home. What will happen...

title: Punishment is Justice
blurb: Sisters of Virgin Mary Kansas is a nunnery filled with ordinary highly religious nuns. However, when the priest is murdered, everything comes crashing down. A relationship is torn apart after abuse from a father. You thought the church was safe, but think again. What secrets are those statues hiding? There are many court cases but what really is the verdict? Remember God is always watching you...

title: His Mind
blurb: “Alone, exposed to all danger, time stops” A world where nothing quite makes sense. Nothing quite adds up. One slip up causes everything to fall apart. Nothing stays the same. People who should be dead are alive and people who should be alive are dead. Worlds are turned upside down, friendships torn apart, relationships formed. Who knows what lies beneath this thrilling, exhilarating mystery we call: His Mind, His World.

title: The Other Side
blurb: Two worlds were about to collide... sending both into chaos. Can anyone save them or are they left to this terrible fate? Explore a world similar to our own. An adventure that holds wonders you could never imagine.

title: The Girl with Two Names
blurb: There is trouble in Stoke-on-Trent… They’re just normal teenagers , living a normal life , until the unthinkable happens in their small town. People are going missing , which is causing chaos throughout the country. No one knows who , what or how these disappearances are happening. The mystery reeks with possibilities and high levels of danger. With the Government left in panic , it is up to the four teens to stop the disappearances and save the city. Can they stop it in time? Four friends One black book And a girl with two names…

title: Pentagon Reversed
blurb: One love triangle. One key. Two universes. Five gems. Five friends. And a box that puts them all in grave peril. But can they stop the world from being destroyed before they destroy themselves?

title: Eternal Damnation
blurb: 3 Worlds . . . 7 Friends . . . 1 Dream

title: Duplicated
blurb: The year is 2068. Humanity has fallen. A tyrannical dictator has resorted to duplicating the citizens of Stoke-on-Trent. The fate of the city rests upon five teenagers and their clones. Only one thing lies between them and their freedom - the wall.

title: The Secret Room
blurb: Lilly and Jack were walking to Watermill school one sunny day. But it wasn’t a normal day at Watermill school… One classroom wasn't all that it seemed. Something terrible happened to Lilly and Jack. But what was it? Special Agent Jacko, KC and Maisy May went on amazing adventures that lead them to magical places. They wanted to save Lilly and Jack from the evil Adolph and Osama. Join us in our big adventures and see what happened to Lilly and Jack

title: Feud of Fire
blurb: The year is 2025, the world is in turmoil, Europe has centralized under one great Alliance, the USA has collapsed due to a mixture of its own inflated currency and inability to keep revolutionary forces under control, while the Middle East has formed into one Caliphate and fights for domination of trade. The two great powers have now clashed for complete control of the great well of resources that the now weak USA has to offer.

title: Consequences
blurb: No two people are the same. Everyone has their own, personal demons, whether they choose to conceal them or embrace them.

title: The Dark Truth
blurb: Jaspar Chapman has been to hell and back in these last couple of months. When he found out his sister, Georgie, was murdered in a hit and run manslaughter, he is determined to find out who killed his sister. Milly Edison has been trying to help her father, Joshua, who got lung cancer from his work. But, Milly can’t cope; she faced a similar difficulty when her mother died. So she then makes the biggest mistake of her life and it is all uncovered by a witness, but no-one knows if this mysterious man is telling the truth. Joshua takes his boss to court, but will it all go to plan for him and Milly? Will Joshua die? And will Jaspar take revenge for his sister?

title: Galley Lane
blurb: A road trip with your teenage friends sounds like a childhood dream. However, when Bittu Singh’s foster dad takes a wrong turn, things go in a deadly direction. Traps, mysterious disappearances and sinister warnings: the very survival of these teenage friends depends on their ability to think fast and navigate through the chaos. Join Bittu and his group of friends as they cheat fate and gamble with their survival against an evil power. Learn about the darker side of the world we live in and how bravery is the only way to conquer it. Moreover, not everyone is who they seem to be...

title: STRANDED!
blurb: It’s winter, 1940. The Clarkes are an average family, going to their father's war posting in Italy. However, when their pilot deliberately crashes their private plane, things take a turn for the worse. Troy, the dad, becomes stranded on an island with his son, Michael. Sophie, the mum, also becomes stranded on a separate island with her two daughters, Mae and Lilly. Both groups, completely stranded. Will the Clarkes get their revenge? Will they ever escape? How will the family deal with being separated? But the biggest question of all, will they make it home...alive?

title: The Disaster at Ryde Orphanage
blurb: In the orphanage, no one is safe... James Prince, the fourteen-year-old living in an orphanage for boys is the hero of the story while Maggie is the owner of the orphanage and the mastermind of a truly evil plot. Only James, with the help of his best friend, Teddy, and detective Mark Wright can save the lives of many adults. Their fate lies in his hands. Can James and Mark save the day after the disaster at Ryde Orphanage for Boys, or will they be caught in the act?

title: Treating the Untreatable
blurb: She somehow made it to the bus stop. The world seemed to be spinning around her and everything suddenly went dark. When she woke up she was on the floor. She had only blacked out for a few seconds, but there was a crowd of people around her. "What can I do to help “They were all saying, but Zoë just shook her head and said thank you. She didn’t need anyone else’s help as long as she could get to the bus stop. When the bus came, her head was still spinning. She couldn’t have M.S. It must have been a mix up.

title: Amora
blurb: In a dismal flat in suburban London, shy, outcast, countryside-born Jac struggles with his new-found independence. No job, few friends and living on benefits, Jac refuses to give up his city dream. A series of events leads Jac down a road of misery and into the world of Amora. Jac drifts between this magical world and his own, struggling to distinguish which is real. As Jac searches to keep his independence in one world, a battle looms in the other.

title: Murdered in 1851
blurb: Tick tock… Tick tock… Tick tock… Gore and mystery hides in every nook, every cranny of this novel. Readers, prepare to find yourself transfixed in a warp of time and terror. Unveil the mystery murderer and experience the mind-bending loops and twists this novel will tell! Read, as a group of teenage boys and girls take you on a journey back in time to find their people and mind-boggling mysteries yet to be solved through the Victorian era. Compose your minds as the intricate characters will take you through a terrifying, emotional, empathetic journey as they are put on the spot with hidden clues and abrupt problems… Are you ready? Are you?

title: A Golden Lie
blurb: The world is coming to an end. It’s up to six ambitious teenagers to save this toxic environment. Will they succeed? The city of Stoke-on-Trent is being held as the victim of these dangerous experiments. But who is behind all of this…

title: In the Shadows
blurb: ‘Cold. Rough. Hard. I am sat here on the floor of a small confined space with no light. I do not know where I am, this is not my bedroom. Why am I here?’ In a dark contemporary setting of Stoke-on-Trent, two teenage boys and five teenage girls embark on a series of quests in hope of finding a missing six year old girl who desperately wants to be back in the care of her foster parents. Will this group of determined teenagers ever find her and those responsible?

title: Willow in The Healing
blurb: Southgate High school is full of drama. Friends turning on each other, parents with drinking problems, pressure and relationships. When Valentina meets Cassie's new Tutor she is head over heels in love. But is it destined to be? And when Valentin catches Cassie's boyfriend kissing Beatrice their friendship will be put to the ultimate test. And will be Beatrice's mum ever get the help she needs? Join Cassie, Beatrice and Valentina as they find out just how much drama you can find in a sixth form.

title: The D.O.T.
blurb: I would be saying in a time and place but time is messed up. Ruby, Betty and Bob have destroyed the D.O.T. and they need to get the crystals that make up the D.O.T. But unfortunately, there are others who want to claim the D.O.T as their own. The crystals are scattered across the world. Will they be able to make the D.O.T in time before time is completely destroyed? Will Ronald Quack get the power to take over world? Will Tyrone get his happy ever after, after everything he has done?

title: GAZA 7th
blurb: RICK: Genius; Mastermind. Every story has bad guy, He doesn't work for anyone, People work for him. A man who never fails, RICK PATEL. It's hard to achieve success in life but easy to consume. lives could be destroyed, No matter who you are, There is involvement, But there is no evidence, Life could be given, OR taken They're hackers, victims and they're rivals. He is coming but I'm waiting...

title: Firewall
blurb: The President needs help. Who does he call? Hack ! What if the world was run by hackers? The President is looking for help and no help is coming. She had no choice but to call the OCTOPUZ(8 Hackers)desperately asking for their help to sabotage the other opponents. They replied YES!.. Later they realize that this mission isn't for them they may be taking risks for the president but they aren't ready for the lies, death, cheats, and loss…

title: The Difference Between Me and You
blurb: In the year 2017, Sam Smith is a transgender girl that moves from a previous school to have a fresh start in a school in London. She leaves her old school, friends, teachers and makes the brave move to Enrich Academy. Whilst she is at the school, she battles with depression, bullies and losing the love of her life who is also her best friend.

title: ROYAL MURDER
blurb: In a world where the people pay the government tax, people try to avoid the payment which results in them having severe punishments. Join Sahir in a plan from when he tries to become successful but discovers that people of higher status keeping deep secrets on his journey and also meeting these people with stories which lead to bad consequences.

title: Identity Thief
blurb: In Miami... Jayden and Donald have been Enemies since childhood, due to an argument that turned sour. When Jayden finds out that Donald had the latest pair of trainers, he felt he had no other choice but to steal them for himself. Unaware of the consequences he would end up with...

title: Sombra
blurb: Sombra (meaning shadow in Spanish) is a story about a 15 year old expert hacker, Alex, and the adventures he goes on after losing all forms of identification while on the run from gangs and agents. He meets his friend in Cairo and some unfriendly pirates on a stolen cargo ship. After several encounters and challenges from the sandy deserts of Cairo to the busy streets of India, Alex arrives back home safely in China.

title: The Devil of the Mind
blurb: THE INVESTIGATOR Picking up his daughter from school, Chief Inspector Dean, a man of great wisdom and experience, stumbles upon a schoolyard brawl that will have massive consequences for the citizens of London. THE COLLEGE Blacksmiths College, an unassuming sixth-form in North London, will forever be tainted by a series of events that will leave millions shamed, embarrassed, and disgraced. THE ART TEACHER A seemingly innocent teacher with a dark past, who preys on the weak and vulnerable, will create upheaval and reveal secrets that are better not to be spoken of. THE HEAD OF I.T A dangerous teacher with a vast knowledge of computer hacking - little does he know his life is about to be turned upside down as he tries to defend his students from a cyber-attack.

title: Ashes
blurb: Ascending upward. Her last breath issued. Demise and nothing substandard. Unwelcome and unfortunate she shook. Goosebumps split her skin, exposing her pedigree. Diana knew she had to save the damned world. Armageddon. Watching her mother losing grip from her sentience. Involuntary and unnatural corruption consumes her.

title: What If?
blurb: Jump into the wild life of Natasha English, a young, preppy American teen. She has a nice life, a good house, and is quite happy, but it all goes wrong when she is struck in the chest by Mike. She gets a strange illness which killed her mother, and shoulders the pain alone, while her doctor, who realizes her dilemma, milks her for money. Does Natasha get better? Will it stay secret? Will she get into University? All will be revealed in the thrilling tale of “What if?”

title: Pseudo
blurb: Pseudo: Not genuine; sham. That’s exactly what the life of Nick Cruz is. A lie. His life has been manipulated by the man who abducted him. 16 years ago. Taken away from the warm embrace of his mother’s arms. Left vulnerable. One life changing event leads him to unravelling the truth. Will it all be what it seems? Will his life, ever be the same again?

title: The Future's Behind Us
blurb: After being sent away for the summer by their parents, a friendship forms between a group of 5 teenagers who very quickly have to learn to put their full trust into each other. A story unfolds where we learn the quirks and weaknesses of each character. As the group are exploring, they stumble across a time machine which takes them to the future, filled with both a waste land and an beautiful land in the sky, flipping their lives upside down. A romance blossoms, and drama occurs. Will the group escape capture and will the robot and boy live happily ever after?

title: The Light In The Shadows
blurb: One bracelet; one big problem. Five friends; two weeks. It’s 2067 and Stoke is in danger. Archie returns home to find a strange bracelet in his dead grandma’s jewellery box. They fight over it, breaking it, opening a portal for all types of entities to escape and putting an end to Veronica’s immortality. Will they save the city before it is too late and it's overrun by chaos?

title: The Unseen
blurb: An outcast, a rich girl, a nerd and a crazy teacher; all trapped in a boarding school. The portal has been opened… a lot of things can happen over a week at Aberdeen Boarding School. A battle between good and evil leads to catastrophic consequences. The fight of the souls will ruin friendships. Will these four teenagers be able to figure out the ungodly secrets of the place they once knew as Aberdeen Boarding School? DEATH, CEMETARIES and EVIL arise at the immoral faculty.

title: In the Shadows Where They Lie
blurb: Mohammed and his younger brother Oliver have been through a lot together. Not only have they lost their parents, they are living in an unfamiliar country, displaced from their own. After being adopted by a man who lives right next to a creepy old house and meeting their new friend Mike, strange noises encourage the three kids to explore. …But will they make it out alive?

title: The Invasion Of Planet X
blurb: Tony’s whole life is about to change as his home is destroyed. Planet X, his new home, has some unwanted inhabitants. A tragic war has broken out on the planet causing new friends to be made and old friends to be lost. Will they win the battle for the human life or will they be overthrown? Find out in this thrilling race for human life...

title: The Mystery of the Purple Planet
blurb: In the Victorian era, a group of detectives reveal the secrets of the Purple Planet. The past has been unraveled and will come back to haunt them. The Queen has been captured by an evil slug that was once human. Jamie discovers the secret but no one will believe him. Who will be the hero? Will they save the queen? Will they do it in time? Read on to find out...

title: Toxic Paradise: A London Story
blurb: Tyreece is a conflicted young musician in a world without rhythm. The unholy trinity of drugs, money and alcohol aren't the only thing to influence his life. But there is one shining light in his life, the beat of the drums like an echo in his heart. Forced to leave the lush countryside of Somerset for the dense forest of tower blocks in Hackney, where both love and hate thrive, Tyreece finds solace and hope in the most unexpected places. He learns that life is to be lived in full joy, and that anyone can change their future by making a difference in the here and now.

title: A Sketch of Smoke
blurb: George Rollins just wants to play his games. And sharing a cabin with three other kids is not his idea of fun. To make matters worse, one of his cabin mates seems a bit batty. Will he ever make friends here? Bruce Thompson lives to the constant toll of his mother’s bell. He looks forward to finally getting a break from his mother’s strict rules. Hopefully his sister, Alisha, won’t tell on him. Twins, Lorrie and Terry, bring their hobbies to camp: sketches and photography. And a secret between them could change the whole weekend. Tensions spark with each activity. How will camp end?

title: The Good Robot	  the Bad Robot	  and the Man That Created Them
blurb: Artificial intelligence is intelligence displayed by machines. What happens when you give them emotions to feel happiness and anger? Zonite is an artificial intelligence, made to bring joy to the world, but what happens when his creator, Professor John, makes a new AI, smarter and more human than him? How will Zonite cope, especially with evil lurking around? Will Zonite get over his feelings and welcome the new AI, or will he let anger take over instead?

title: The Universal Crime
blurb: Ben turned to the side, quick breaths, sweat gushing down his bruised forehead and neck like a violent stream of lava. His legs numbed, the ground opened wide, he was falling, leaving; his short lived time was almost up. The forgotten secrets and only if he had known a little earlier, it would have been a different story. This lucid event was bound to happen; it was a simple mission that went terribly wrong, or did it?

title: Rogue
blurb: Harriet Treadwell, the fourteen year old with a difference. Chris Williamson, the girl with the skin of stone and a heart of gold. The care home filled with unfortunate incidents. Living a poor life. The cruel life. The harsh life. Chloe, Cassie and Ryan, all too clever for their own good. Mark, always in the wrong place at the wrong time. And VICKE. Artificial Intelligence. A deadly gang. Runaways. Death.

title: Cloud Attack
blurb: Do you like like the sound of conflict? Well then here’s the book for you. Stormzy is a cloud who is 14 and takes on a very important role when a disaster strikes; A war between humans and clouds. Stormzy and his friends try to put it right.... But will it help? Could it destroy Cloudville? Want to find out? Then you’d better open the book now! This book portrays a very important message and I think you will enjoy the book so don't just stand there reading the blurb open the front cover and start reading!

title: The Mystery of the Hidden Treasure
Cuckoo Cop
blurb: This action, romance and adventure story will keep you on the edge of your seat. Here is a story about a corrupt cop who will pay the ultimate price of stealing drugs of one of the most powerful people in NYC. Wealthy cop or too wealthy? Is Gordon Bolton trying to drag Charlie into scandal or is he on his side forever? It starts in a city far far away called New York. Charlie pays the price of having blood on his hands and money in his pocket. His wife thinks about the welfare of the kids and leaves Charlie wondering what to do next. In a race against time to save the people he loves and to destroy Gordon Bolton once and for all... What would you do?

title: Superheroes Save the Day
blurb: So it is a bright day and a school is going to a zoo to look at the gorillas and lions. But what they see is not that. They face a fierce enemy who plans on doing something horrific. It could result in the end of life as we know it it, if the children don’t come together to stop this fierce foe. Can they defeat the super villain in time to protect everyone and everything…? The whole world rests in the balance of just three children, can they save the world...?!

title: Glenburn Sports College - Memories
blurb: On the dark hills around the Skelmersdale Beacon lurks a creature. It preys on the unsuspecting, stealing their memories in it’s search for answers. But it’s taken one memory too many. When a teenager dies while out on the Beacon at night, his friends vow to take their revenge. But there’s more to this monster than what meets the eye. Can the friends unravel the secrets of the creature and the mysterious PezCorp before someone else dies?

title: The Adventures of Dash and Webwoman
blurb: Normal children by day but when there’s crime they’re superheroes! There are villains to defeat and a mysterious egg to rescue. Why is everyone after the egg?

title: Revenge: It gets you nowhere
blurb: Revenge is taken by many, but who is at fault? Sky goes on her mission to resolve what has been a mystery for the past 18 years. Is it destiny which messed up their lives or was it someone else? When a mysterious person rushes up to Kyle and tells him the truth about his life, his life is turned upside down. Alex tries to solve these mysteries with the help of his unknown right hand. Somewhat quiet, somewhat mysterious, somewhat… riddled. Questions will be asked, mysteries will be solved, crimes will be committed. It’s all going to happen. Will revenge be taken? Will the truth be revealed? Questions will always remain… Find out what happens in this awesome crime-thriller ‘Revenge: it gets you nowhere’.

title: Super 11 vs Robot
blurb: 10 normal students in middle school and one 3 year old in nursery. They all have their different groups like the popular girls, the gymnasts and the clumsy guy. They hate each other. They have to come together to bring back the parents who have mysteriously disappeared; it is pretty hard with a robot in the way! All of them have special abilities; they just have to know how to use them in a good way. Time is running out- can they bring the adults back or will they grow up without them… Could you bring them back if you were here? Read this story of exciting adventures and see if they can bring them back!

title: Walking Through the Ashes
blurb: The air is filled with ash, the heat is stifling, and society is falling apart. In the grey and lawless south-west United States Dylan Gallie, a little boy in a small Texas town, struggles to survive with his asthmatic mother. While further north his older sister, Tamie, fights to get back to her family at the same time that Lily Gomez, Tamie’s neighbour and long-time friend, struggles to return to her own home. The chaos and destruction of the new world threatens not just their lives, but their humanity and their hope, as they fight to reunite with their loved ones.

title: The Games: The Fight for Freedom
blurb: Dear Contestants, If you want to survive The Game, you will have to endure a world of mad scientists, crazed monsters and serial killers with split personalities. The world is brutal. The people are insane, and the monsters are cruel. But in a world where a brutal dictator reigns over everyone; except a mad scientist with morals that might be even sketchier than the power-crazed ruler. Whose side will our heroes take in a world in which what was right died when the wall went up. Or will they perish with the rest? So. Do you want to play?

title: Beyond the Mind
blurb: When Gregg, Louis and Peter are struck down by mental ill-health, everything changes. But for one of the boys, his condition may not be quite what it seems...

title: Inferos: The New Race
blurb: After two hundred years the human population has evolved. A new species has come through who are unbreakable. A normal day for sixth formers Evangeline, Tyler, Blythe and Michael soon turns their lives upside down. News reporter Evangeline and her cameraman brother begin to uncover that what seemed like a terrorist attack is actually a plot of something far more sinister. What could it be? There are deaths, love triangles, betrayals and more which change life as they know it. Is Eva making a mistake uncovering a secret which has been protected by this new violent race for so long? How far will she go and will the truth ever come to the surface? There is only one way to find out…

title: The Adventure of the Four Friends
blurb: When Lucy leaves England for New York, she feels happy for her mother but sad because she is not going to see her best friend, Chloe, all the time. She goes to this new school called St. Ravens. Cara, Cerise and Gracie ask to be her friends but she ignores them and walks away. At lunch time, Lucy gets tricked by the three evil cats, Forax, Borax and Torax, and she decides to work with the girls to try and make the cats and headmistress good. Will they be able to make the cats and headmistress good?… Find out in the story.

title: In My Words
blurb: A wonderful month in an exciting writing camp turns for the worse after a string of mysterious events. A group of friends must solve the mystery. But will they be successful? Or will anarchy reign supreme? Read this book to find out the answer to all these questions and more…

title: Watch us
blurb: There is drama at Camp Rushcliffe, and just when it seems like everything is perfect it turns out ‘everything’ is not. Disappearance. Murder. Truth and Lies. Killing is the input, blood is the outcome. Drama becomes reality. All dreams turns to nightmares. Will there be any happy endings?

title: Notification
blurb: Rebecca has been taken away from her family by a notorious criminal that escaped prison years ago with an old running buddy who soon left him for a different life. When the family realise that their daughter has been taken they meet some old friends that they never really buried the hatchet with. Her mother gives up secrets to Rebecca, leading her to find out things that should not be revealed but that take them into a whole different world.

title: Sound of Madness
blurb: They lived a happy life and then something bad happened. What if it was something so bad that they wanted to kill themselves...each other? Brother and sister. Homeless. Heartless. And your parents want to kill you. Would you run or hide?

title: The Portal Awakens
blurb: As a consequence of a perilous dare, three eleven year old children went into the neglected storeroom (not aware of the dangers)...where a portal awoke! They thought they had hit a dead end, but found it was just the beginning of their journey... Ebony black was all they saw as they got sucked into the portal and ended up at an anonymous, bewitched land full of surprises. William, Jayde and Lewis face a strenuous realm of challenges. The secret to escape is to work as a team, can they get along? They have to find a way out. Will they escape?

title: A Twist in Time
blurb: They were pursued. Hunted. Their advance was imminent. They had gone so far, that they could not afford to be held captive now. Paris. The Eiffel Tower. They needed to get there, and quick. Otherwise, they would be doomed for eternity… Johni Stein, an exceptionally talented 12 year old, is a student of a government academy for young scientists. At AFESTY (Academy For Exceptionally Scientifically Talented Youth) HQ, he receives a scruffily written letter, from a man called Andrew Shepardson. Shepardson had allegedly created a time travel device with limitless possibilities. He is sent to prove the validity of these lunatic claims, but an accident nearly results in his demise…

title: The Nightmare on Dark Woods
blurb: A street with its darkest tale yet. Four curious kids: John, Tom, Axel, Buster see a dodgy man with his suspicious looking dog move into the house next door. When curiosity drives the kids into the house … everything changes. They encounter horrors they never imagined and are terrified in so many ways. So brace yourself for a haunting trip that will make you quiver in your covers.

title: Deception of Success
blurb: “My senses heighten. Every snapping twig sends jolts through my spine... I can no longer tell up from down.” The end has brought a new beginning, when young teens try desperately to ‘fit’ into the adult world - only to get lost in a tangle of corporate mess. Darren is a seventeen year old boy who has constantly tried to please his father. Though that seems to be impossible, he believes his plan to create a group business with his friends will be the final solution. Blinded by greed, the four friends struggle to get their business noticed. Fencing and betrayal follow. Playing a dangerous game of Cludo, who will win and who will be hurt along the way? What happens next...? Bloody chases, lies, treachery, death and pain. What more could you ask for? A crime-thriller with a twist!

title: The Compass With The Two Halves
